version_description:
Thanks for using our new app. We have a new version of Wifiman for you that has a couple of things fixed and improved.

Fixes:
- hidden MAC address of UBNT devices
- showing devices from other networks or other nonexisting devices with .localdomain domain
- weird device names like c0:d0:12:bf:02:44@fe80::c2d0:12ff:febf:244
- discovery scanner sometimes hangs on higher percentages of the scan

Improvements:
- performance of discovery
- use name from UPnP as device name if make sense

We are currently working on several great features that will come soon in future versions. So stay tuned!

We are currently working on several great features that will come soon in future versions. So stay tuned!

Thanks for using our new app. We have a new version of WiFiman for you. This time it is big update! We've redesigned whole app to new modern UI.

We are currently working on several great features that will come soon in future versions. So stay tuned!

Thanks for using our new app. We have a new version of WiFiman for you. This time it is big update! We've redesigned whole app to new modern UI.

We are currently working on several great features that will come soon in future versions. So stay tuned!

Thanks for using our new app. We have a new version of WiFiman for you. This time it has new feature Custom pings!

NEW FEATURES

- Custom pings. You can now add and remove servers for pings. Only gateway can't be removed. To try it out, go to Status screen and hit More button.

IMPROVEMENTS

- Upgrade to iOS 12
- Update database of Ubiquiti devices and images

FIXES

- UI glitches in Status screen
- Crashes during start of app

We value your feedback! If you have an idea how to improve the app, feel free to contact us at mobilefeedback@ubnt.com.

We value your feedback! If you have an idea how to improve the app, feel free to contact us at mobilefeedback@ubnt.com.

Thanks for using our new app. We have a new version of WiFiman for you.

NEW FEATURES

- Links to quick start guide, datasheet and product page (and store link if you are in US) in detail of Ubiquiti device in Discovery
- "Manage in app" button in detail of Ubiquiti device in Discovery

We value your feedback! If you have an idea how to improve the app, feel free to contact us at mobilefeedback@ubnt.com.

Thanks for using our new app. We have a new version of WiFiman for you. This time it has only fixes. Bunch of fixes.

FIXED

- fixed few crashes during start or bringing the app to foreground
- fixed one crash in Discovery
- show more info in Status Details to actually see what is wrong

We value your feedback! If you have an idea how to improve the app, feel free to contact us at mobilefeedback@ubnt.com.

We value your feedback! If you have an idea how to improve the app, feel free to contact us at mobilefeedback@ubnt.com.

Thanks for using our new app. We have a new version of WiFiman for you. This time a lot of small fixes and improvements plus Today Widget!

NEW FEATURES

- WiFiman now has Today Widget for quick access of current internet connectivity status, wifi and pings.
- Discovery now shows warning when there is chance of a UniFi device controlled by some controller (UniFi Cloud Key for example).

FIXED

- Fixed UPnP protocol, now works much *much* more reliably.
- UI in Discovery is now much more fluent and without any animation or scrolling glitches.

We value your feedback! If you have an idea how to improve the app, feel free to contact us at mobilefeedback@ubnt.com.

Thanks for using our new app. We have a new version of WiFiman for you.

NEW FEATURES

- Speed Test server selection
- Share speed test
- iPad support

FIXED

- Some crashes during startup and in Discovery
- Improve speed test server selection after startup
- Improve stability of Status screen

We value your feedback! If you have an idea how to improve the app, feel free to contact us at mobilefeedback@ubnt.com.

Thanks for using our app. We have a new version of WiFiman for you.

NEW
- Added Port Scan feature. Now you can scan for open ports in detail of device.

FIXED
- Hangs in Discovery.

Plus some other crash fixes and small improvements.

We value your feedback! If you have an idea how to improve the app, feel free to contact us at mobilefeedback@ubnt.com.
